heroInjuries.name: Dead
heroInjuries.description: The warrior is dead. Remove from roster. All equipment is lost.

heroInjuries.name: Multiple Injuries
heroInjuries.description: Roll D6 times on the serious injuries table.

heroInjuries.name: Smashed Leg
heroInjuries.description: Cannot run but may still charge. -1 Movement permanently.

heroInjuries.name: Old Battle Wound
heroInjuries.description: Before each battle roll D6: on 1, misses the battle.

heroInjuries.name: Deep Wound
heroInjuries.description: Misses the next battle while recovering.

heroInjuries.name: Full Recovery
heroInjuries.description: The warrior makes a full recovery.

heroInjuries.name: Bitter Enmity
heroInjuries.description: Hates the warband that caused the injury.

heroInjuries.name: Captured
heroInjuries.description: The warrior is captured by the enemy. Roll after game to see fate.

henchmenInjuries.name: Dead
henchmenInjuries.description: The henchman is removed from the roster.

henchmenInjuries.name: Multiple Injuries
henchmenInjuries.description: The henchman must miss the next game.

henchmenInjuries.name: Full Recovery
henchmenInjuries.description: The henchman makes a full recovery.
